_sText:
My First Combat Map.
==================

I think there shouldnÂ´t be any bugs now

but if you find some just tell me

How to play
==================
All Weapons are at the Spawn just choose one

except AWP and G3sg1 (autoshoot sniper)

After the teleport on the left and the right u will get 

teleportet in the middle if you fall down on the ground you will

get teleportet in the jail. (the trigger teleport is a very high set,

otherwise the player will get a bug and die if they fall down)

U can only set the players free out of the jail, killing only with weapons.

The only reason u could die with fall dmg should be the rotating plattform in  

the middle.

At last after 3 Minutes the map will be shaking if you are in the range of

the shake it signs you that there are 2 extra teleports where u can get in 2

extra spots nearly the spawn.

Alright this should be all nice surfing everyone :)
------------------

### This Map was created for Tick66 and sv_airaccelerate 150


Thanks to Sangre for always helping me when i have a problem
============================================================
